value.title: How to use Azure Monitor Application Insights to record custom events | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Monitor Application Insights to make your application logging smarter with Custom Event Tracking.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your

value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. value.title: Introducing the Azure Data Box family | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mathew Dickson joins Donovan Brown to discuss the Data Box family of solutions to meet the challenge of moving data to the cloud. Azure Data Box offline devices help you transfer large amounts of data to Azure when the network isn't an option. Data Box online products act as network storage gateways

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday

value.excerpt: Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how to use Entity Framework (EF) Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB. value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure VM disk performance and how to enable caching to help optimize read and write access to storage.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Build applications on the cloud
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn how developers write programs that run on the cloud, including how to deploy, be fault-tolerant, load balance, scale, and deal with latency.

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a .NET Core application to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Learn how to create and deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL for fully managed, enterprise-ready PostgreSQL database services.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Find out how to develop an Azure Function in Visual Studio with a test framework to create, deploy, and test this scalable and secure service.

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of writing and replicating customized data to regions around the world with Azure Cosmos DB global distribution.
